p: Sikasso and Koulikoro regions are the principal sorghum-producing regions, with 31% and 22% of national production respectively ( Kelly et al. 2015). These areas have been priority target areas for sorghum breeding, especially for hybrid development in Mali since sorghum is the primary staple in much of this zone ( ICRISAT, 2015). Rattunde et al. (2013) found average yield advantages of 380 kg/ha to 660 kg/ha with hybrids relative to an adapted landrace.
